resources.string:
Tournament Manager is a mobile app for Android that allows you to collect statistics from amateur sports events (regular football play with colleagues, etc.) and generate balanced teams based on statistics.
	Currently, the application supports sports like football / hockey and tennis / squash / badminton / bowling. 

	Our development team: 
Ing. Zdeněk Rybola, Ph.D. - Project Leader - zdenek.rybola@fit.cvut.cz 
Tomáš Prachenský - Team Leader - prachtom@fit.cvut.cz 
Martin Souček - soucem10@fit.cvut.cz 
Karel Ševčík - sevcika1@fit.cvut.cz 
Aleksei Baklanov - baklaal1@fit.cvut.cz 
Richard Michálek - micharic@fit.cvut.cz 
Jan Mikolášek - mikolja8@fit.cvut.cz 
	Contact us via e-mail:
tournament_manager_bowling@googlegroups.com
